## R Markdown
```{r}
song_data <- fromJSON("https://stat.auckland.ac.nz/~fergusson/stats220/data/lab4B.json")

summarised_data <- song_data %>%
   mutate(song_speed = ifelse(tempo > 120, "fast", "slow")) %>%
  group_by(song_speed) %>%
  summarise(n = n())

summarised_data %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(x = reorder(song_speed, -n), y = n)) +
  labs(x = "song_speed")

```
